column4: Important problem I don't know how to solve, I've just installed ubuntu on a machine, installation was fine, I've tried ubuntu before installing and everything was fine. After rebooting it shows the ubuntu loading message, then it disappears and shows .

a fail for "Starting automatic crash report generation", few more lines and it's stuck on Stopping save kernel messages. Version is 11.10. I can access a terminal by pressing ctrl+alt+f2 if necessary.
What log file should I read for more info?
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
